ComicInfo.Summary:
LET THE RICK ONE IN: PART I. In this two-part spooky special, Rick and Morty face the hideous hordes of the sexy undead-VAMPIRES! Featuring the goth co-writing styles of Tini Howard (Assassinistas, Rick and Morty: Pocket Like You Stole It)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Marc Ellerby & Allison Strejlau | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike Vasquez | 2 | RE | Retailer Exclusive B&W Variant Cover | Mike Vasquez | 3 | RE | Oni Press Exclusive Foil Variant Cover | Mike Vasquez | 4 | RE | More Great Art & Merrymac Games and Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | David Angelo Roman | 5 | RE | Amorphous Ink Comics Exclusive Sketch Variant Cover | Angie Knowles | 6 | RE | Brain Trust/Wasatch Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Steven Wilcox & Jeremy S. Browning | 7 | *Notes:* The 5 Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of The X-Men #100.The 2, 3 & 4 Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of The X-Men #141.
